markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 13"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Can't Fall Here](/Feats.aspx?ID=2375) <actions string="Reaction" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Auditory" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=16" />
<trait label="Hobgoblin" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=268" />
<trait label="Manipulate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=104" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 35 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Frequency**
once per day

**Trigger**
An adjacent and willing ally would be reduced to 0 HP but not killed.

</column>

---

You physically help an ally remain standing and encourage them to push through their pain against dire odds. Your ally doesn't fall [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38) and remains at 1 Hit Point. The ally also gains a number of temporary Hit Points equal to your level that last for 1 minute. Fighting onward with such an injury isn't without consequence; your ally's [wounded](/Conditions.aspx?ID=42) condition increases by 1.
name: Can't Fall Here
